title: 3rd sem cse
content: Are slides and notes on PESU academy enough for ISA's or does one have to refer to the textbooks?

comments.body: The slides are enough but if u wanna score an S grade then go thru the text book once.. if an A or something is enough then do the slides and look online for similar questions and solve them
Slides enough for most subjects as long you pay attention in class to get an S. DDCO textbook recommended.
